title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.5 - Horse in paddock not to be touched
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4222.5 - Horse in paddock not to be touched

State Regulations

No one not actually connected with its stable shall touch
a horse while in the paddock preparatory to starting in a race, except for
authorized inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4222.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
